#summary JPA
= Introduction =

 * JPA = Java Persistence API
== Annotations ==
 * @Entity
 * @Transient
== Collections supported ==
 * Collection
 * List
 * Set
 * Map
== Good to know ==
 * Runtime exceptions thrown by property accessor methods cause the current transaction to be rolled
back.
